content: "http://www.breitbart.com/article.php?id=CNG.13d3a2fbfc306c176c00483f74ae99a8.1291&show_article=1" "The Bush administration had refused to release the images to the public, arguing that the disclosure would fuel outrage and violate US obligations toward detainees under the Geneva Conventions."

title: US military braces for release of detainee photos
